name: Yuukyuu no Eden: The Eternal Eden
overview: Magic in the air and items in floating islands in the great adventure: Yuukyuu no Eden The Eternal Eden. The game's main character called Roddy starts his adventure when he found a treasure of the islands of Eden. There are 7 Islands: Forest island, Sea island, Magic island, Golden island, Ice island, Machenery island & Darkness Island. Each of those islands got their own schemes. The game uses a 3d graphics engine that can be rotate by the player. Each islands got their own dangers, like ice blocks in the ice island, magic traps in the magic island, etc. The game features a workshop system in which the player's character can create new objects and weapons combine other objects or items. The game features a isometric view and 2d cartoon graphics for the game characters.
